sentence: Although Barnette's performance could be troubling for Trump, it may bode well for another prominent Republican, Florida Governor Ron DeSantis, who is emerging as a leading contender for the GOP's presidential nomination in 2024.
author: Katherine Fung
title: Trumpism Is Moving Beyond Trump and That's Good News for Ron DeSantis
